attributes.action: Ringfence all motoring related taxes (fuel tax,car tax,and excise duty), fines (speeding and other motoring offences) , roadside parking ,tolls and congestion charges  paid by motorists. Use the revenue thus raised for the construction and upkeep of the road infrastructure only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The governments mindset that the motorist must pay for everything needs to be changed.
That one section of the community should be taxed to pay for things that should come from general taxation such as public transport, central government expenditure and local council costs is totally wrong and unfair.
Motoring related taxes must be reduced to reflect the amount spent on roads only.
